snippet: Alpine Cinema in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, charges $6 per seat on Wednesday nights, providing a low-budget movie option for families and frugal couples.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Alpine Cinema, Art Deco-style movie theater in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, that offers seats for $6 on Wednesday nights and draws diverse mix of moviegoers.
lead_paragraph: Alpine Cinema in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, charges $6 per seat on Wednesday nights, providing a low-budget movie option for families and frugal couples.

headline.main: Wednesday Night Fever in Bay Ridge
